## Identifier.getLatestClaimValue() method

Convenience method

const name = await identifier.getLatestClaimValue({type: 'name'})

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getLatestClaimValue(dbConnection: Promise<Connection>, where: {
        type: string;
    }): Promise<string | null | undefined>;
```
